title: Textile, "Botanical", 2006
medium:
Medium: non-woven polyester
Technique: digital inkjet printed with pigment and disperse-dye ink
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 303 x 82 cm (9 ft. 11 5/16 in. x 32 5/16 in.)
description: White ground with five pastel-colored circles, each containing a botanical drawing composed of very fine lines in a hatching effect.

exhibitions.title: Design Life Now: National Design Triennial 2006
